title: Blended Language Learning Intensive Course for Corporate Leaders

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of profession-specific terminology
context.additional_context: Manager/leader-targeted program aiming to strengthen corporate global communication competencies, combining online learning and offline workshops via digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately utilize three or more professional language expressions (e.g., negotiation, presentation) in business contexts.
Learners can conduct one or more real-time language feedback sessions with peer learners using online collaboration tools.
Learners can execute customer consultation scenarios through offline role-play activities with over 80% accuracy.

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (Video Conferencing, Document Sharing, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
